instructions_en: Use this tool to screen for adverse childhood experiences in adults and children. As the ACE score increases, so does the potential risk for chronic health problems. Identifying ACEs early can help with prevention and early intervention.

seo.meta_description_en: The Adverse Childhood Experiences (ACE) Score screens for adverse childhood experiences.
seo.keywords_en: Adverse Childhood Experiences (ACE) Score, ace, ace score, adverse experiences, trauma, childhood trauma, abuse, child abuse

about.formula_en:
The ACE Score is calculated by the addition of the selected points:

about.more_info_en: A higher ACE Score corresponds with a higher risk of health, social, and emotional problems.

Validation.text: Dong M, Anda RF, Felitti VJ, et al. The interrelatedness of multiple forms of childhood abuse, neglect, and household dysfunction. Child Abuse Negl. 2004;28(7):771-784.

Original/Primary Reference.text: Felitti VJ, Anda RF, Nordenberg D, et al. Relationship of childhood abuse and household dysfunction to many of the leading causes of death in adults. The Adverse Childhood Experiences (Ace) Study. Am J Prev Med. 1998;14(4):245-258.

Other References.text: Watson P. How to screen for ACEs in an efficient, sensitive, and effective manner. Paediatr Child Health. 2019;24(1):37-38.

Zarse EM, Neff MR, Yoder R, Hulvershorn L, Chambers JE, Chambers RA. The adverse childhood experiences questionnaire: Two decades of research on childhood trauma as a primary cause of adult mental illness, addiction, and medical diseases. Schumacher U, ed. Cogent Medicine. 2019;6(1):1581447.
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. Adverse Childhood Experiences (ACEs).

creator_info.about_en: Vincent J. Felitti, MD, is a clinical professor of medicine at the University of California in San Diego, CA. He was awarded the Distinguished Worldwide Humanitarian Award in 2019 and the Albert Nelson Marquis Lifetime Achievement Award in 2018. Dr. Felitti’s primary research is focused on how adverse childhood experiences affect adults.
